<h3 id="X39871">X(39871) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-ARA TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (a^2+b^2-c^2)*(a^2-b^2+c^2)*(2*a^8-5*(b^2+c^2)*a^6+5*(b^2+c^2)^2*a^4-3*(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39871) = 2*X(6776)-3*X(11245) = 2*X(9967)-3*X(34664) = 3*X(12022)-X(12283)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39871) lies on these lines: {4,193}, {5,26206}, {6,235}, {25,6776}, {30,6403}, {33,39897}, {34,39873}, {69,1593}, {141,19124}, {182,468}, {185,1503}, {394,427}, {403,18583}, {428,542}, {511,1885}, {524,12294}, {546,18449}, {568,6756}, {1353,1596}, {1594,18358}, {1597,11898}, {1598,13292}, {1902,5847}, {1907,15069}, {1974,8550}, {3089,14912}, {3147,12017}, {3515,25406}, {3516,10519}, {3542,5050}, {3629,11470}, {3818,23047}, {5064,11180}, {5090,39885}, {5410,39876}, {5411,39875}, {5446,12421}, {5480,8541}, {5848,12138}, {6225,12173}, {6467,12241}, {6623,11405}, {6746,9969}, {7487,18914}, {7505,38110}, {7507,13562}, {7713,39878}, {9924,19467}, {9967,34664}, {10019,19130}, {11363,39870}, {11380,39872}, {11382,18909}, {11383,39877}, {11384,39880}, {11385,39881}, {11386,39882}, {11388,39887}, {11389,39888}, {11390,39889}, {11391,39890}, {11392,39891}, {11393,39892}, {11394,39895}, {11395,39896}, {11396,39898}, {11398,39900}, {11399,39901}, {11400,39902}, {11401,39903}, {11442,15809}, {11832,39886}, {12022,12283}, {12220,12362}, {13367,15585}, {13383,19129}, {13488,18436}, {13884,19145}, {13937,19146}, {14853,37197}, {14927,37196}, {16196,26156}, {16252,21637}, {19128,21841}, {19154,37971}, {22479,39883}, {26883,34774}, {35488,38136}, {35764,39893}, {35765,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39871) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (193, 13142), (3575, 1843), (6467, 12241), (12220, 12362), (39874, 18914), (39899, 13292)<br>
X(39871) = {X(3089), X(14912)}-harmonic conjugate of X(19118)<br>
</p>
